title: Corbyn's Big Reveal & A Tory Power Grab? (with Gina Miller)
itunes:title: Corbyn's Big Reveal & A Tory Power Grab? (with Gina Miller)
description:
As Labour accuses the Tories of selling out the NHS, we ask Jagjit Chadha, Director of think tank NIESR about the health service's role in a trade deal, and discuss the political consequences with Bloomberg's Stuart Biggs. And Gina Miller, co-founder of SCM Direct, warns the Conservative party manifesto threatens people's ability to take the government to court. Plus Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek flesh out the SNP manifesto with our Edinburgh reporter, Rodney Jefferson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
As Labour accuses the Tories of selling out the NHS, we ask Jagjit Chadha, Director of think tank NIESR about the health service's role in a trade deal, and discuss the political consequences with Bloomberg's Stuart Biggs. Plus Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek flesh out the SNP manifesto with our Edinburgh reporter, Rodney Jefferson.
